entry.title: 280 GSM Poly/Cotton Parka with ThermoMAXX Insulation in Orange - Viking VC50JO
entry.summary:
Vendor: Viking
Type: Parkas
Price: 121.19 - 122.65 (7 variants)

[shortdesc]
  • 280 gsm ThermoMAXX insulation provides warmth up to -50°C/-60°F
  • Fully compliant with CSA Z96-15 Class 1, Level 2
  • Fully compliant with ANSI/ISEA 107-2015 Type O, Class 1, not FR
  • 2 Inch Vi-brance reflective material in 4 Inch contrasting tape meets WCB/Worksafe/DOT configuration
    • [/shortdesc]

    Product Specifications

    Brand Viking
    Color Orange
    Product Type Parkas

    Extra Product Information

  • 280 gsm ThermoMAXX insulation provides warmth up to -50°C/-60°F
  • 270 gsm (8 oz/yd²) 65/35 poly/cotton fabric provides superior abrasion and tear resistance
  • Insulated detachable hood
  • Fully hemstitched seams eliminates unravelling

    • Suggested Application

  • Foul weather protection as well as thermal layer
  • Municipality crews working on road construction and traffic control
  • Automotive mechanics for protection from dirt and grease when fixing vehicles
    		•
